Bruce Lee - To express oneself honestly.title: Bruce Lee - To express oneself honestly is hard to do

0bbcb505c19f32ea49e4dd13b7bfd8d2875a1b7e.title: How to discover from where zite was cloned and its adress if knowing only .bit name & open zite's local directory

1557319202_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: It shows that the .bit **site address** can be discovered from within site menu or from its source code.
To open site directory one can also use OPEN SITE DIRECTORY link inside the site menu.
